name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior FHIR Engineer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I excel in integrating healthcare data standards including **FHIR**, **HL7**, **SNOMED CT**, **LOINC**, **ICD-10**, **CPT**, and **RxNorm**. Proficient in **Java**, **C#**, and **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), I develop secure and efficient applications focused on healthcare solutions, ensuring compliance with **HIPAA** regulations. My skill set includes developing **RESTful APIs** and leveraging cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for robust application architecture. I am adept at leading projects with a strong emphasis on **SMART on FHIR** and **OAuth 2.0** authentication protocols. Additionally, I utilize my strong problem-solving abilities and effective communication skills to drive project success while mentoring junior developers towards professional growth.
